metadata.title: CVE-2021-3522 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
GStreamer before 1.18.4 may perform an out-of-bounds read when handlingcertain ID3v2 tags.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3522` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-gst-plugins-base-1.0 - 1.16.2-4ubuntu0.1
gstreamer1.0-alsa - 1.16.2-4ubuntu0.1
gstreamer1.0-gl - 1.16.2-4ubuntu0.1
gstreamer1.0-plugins-base - 1.16.2-4ubuntu0.1
gstreamer1.0-plugins-base-apps - 1.16.2-4ubuntu0.1
gstreamer1.0-x - 1.16.2-4ubuntu0.1
libgstreamer-gl1.0-0 - 1.16.2-4ubuntu0.1
libgstreamer-plugins-base1.0-0 - 1.16.2-4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-base1.0 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.16.2-4ubuntu0.1').
